name: Rhino Run - by Torn
description:
TORN's submission for The Campus Game Jam 2022.

[ DISCLAMER: this game was made in a short period of time and some aspects of the game are not fully functional ]

Rhino Run was inspired by the rhino poaching crisis in Africa. The plight of the rhinos is something close to our hearts and we thought that something like this could bring awareness to those not in the know, and inspire people to take action. Education and social causes are ways of making games that make a difference.

This is a simple game where you are controlling a decoy rhinoceros to lure poachers into traps. You must avoid being shot by the poachers and use your decoy to prevent the other real rhinos from being shot.

Categories we're trying to compete in: 

  • Best Game
  • Best Technical Game
  • Best Educational
  • Best Mobile Game
  • Best Aesthetics
  • Community Favourite

Torn Team Members:

  • Chris O'Brien - Design Lead
  • Francesca Fitzgerald - Designer
  • Kayla Molenaar - Art Lead
  • Jordan Zunde - Programming Lead
  • Damien Grobler - Programmer
  • Jude Cooksey - Music Lead, Art

This game was built to be compatible with both mobile and desktop gaming. The controls are simple enough to be easily integrated with mobile displays.

This game was created to raise awareness about the rhino poaching in Africa and to encourage people to assist where they can. 

( All information and statistics taken from the World Wildlife Fund website https://wwf.panda.org/ )
